name: Careful Defense
description:
Careful Defense                                                                                                 Play in fullscreen for best experience

Careful Defense is a strategy tower defense game with a little twist. You'll only get money when enemies get to the end. However, you lose your hearths too. The more health monster has the more damage you'll take.  You can buy towers and more health with this money.

This creates interesting gameplay, where you don't want to kill the enemies but want to get their health as low as possible, so you don't lose much health. 

There are multiple types of cannons and monsters, each with different stats. Some cannons fit better for a certain situation than others. Monsters come in endless waves that keep getting harder; Monsters get harder to defeat and more monsters come as time goes on. How far can you survive?

This game is an entry for the ludum-dare-46 game jam. The theme is "Keep it alive" and this game follows that theme. The time to make a game was 72 hours and this game was made during that time.

What was made during the jam?

All the art was made for this game. I didn't reuse any old textures.

The music and sound effects were made during the jam.

Also all the coding happened within the 72 hours.
